text:
Welcome!

Your teacher will tell you which tab to open next. When you do, drag the information from your client tab into your workspace using the 6 dots in the corner of that tile.

You can only edit tiles that are within your workspace to the right. If you lose a question tile, you can get a fresh copy of it below.

  • Click on the dots in the top right corner of the desired question tile below and drag it into your own workspace.
  • Answer each question in your workspace by typing in the tile with the question in it.

Question 1

Interpret and restate the client’s end goal in your own words.

{Write your answer here}

Questions 2

Describe what is important to consider as you do the first task, keeping the end goal in mind.

{Write your answer here}

Question 3

What assumptions will you make to help the client with the first task?

{Write your answer here}

Question 4

Use what is important and your assumptions to create variable chips for your client’s eventual model.

{Write your answer here}

Question 5

Describe how your variables are related to each other and/or to the client's end goal.

{Write your answer here}
